ch0120_10_lusamine/0101_0701_01_10:
I’m so glad that we got to meet,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0120_10_lusamine/0101_0701_02_10:
I’m here, as always, to shine a bright light on the
future of every sync pair.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7101_0701_01_10:
Day and night, I am hard at work doing research,
for the sake of Trainers and Pokémon everywhere.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7101_0701_02_10:
That sounded pretty serious, didn’t it? The truth is,
I do it because I love it.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7101_0701_03_10:
You, too, should do what you love the most. If that
helps other people, even better. It’ll bring you
even more happiness.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7102_0701_01_10:
What do you think about this sygna suit? It’s quite
refined and elegant, don’t you think?
ch0120_10_lusamine/7102_0701_02_10:
Since I’m the president of the Aether Foundation,
appearances are very important!
ch0120_10_lusamine/7102_0701_03_10:
I especially love the design at the neckline. It’s
very colorful, and looks like the light of a prism.
It looks very lovely.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7103_0701_01_10:
I feel a strong, radiant light between you and your
partner Pokémon...
ch0120_10_lusamine/7103_0701_02_10:
The more Necrozma and I battle together, the
brighter our own light shines. This light must be
the power of a sync pair’s bond.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7104_0701_01_10:
Now that I’m able to spend time on Pasio together
with my children, from time to time I think of my
husband.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7104_0701_02_10:
Before, I just hoped that he was still alive out
there, and that he was happy...
ch0120_10_lusamine/7104_0701_03_10:
But now I’d really like to show him just how much
our children have grown.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7105_0701_01_10:
I used to think that I could keep Pokémon safe and
protect them with my love...
ch0120_10_lusamine/7105_0701_02_10:
But now I understand that Pokémon and Trainers
are supposed to protect and support each other.
ch0120_10_lusamine/7105_0701_03_10:
*chuckle* But you knew that all along, didn’t you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0120_10_lusamine/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking for you. I wanted to give
you this.
ch0120_10_lusamine/1701_0702_01_10: I hope it will help you.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2501_0701_01_10:
Before, I thought of Necrozma as a menace to
be defeated. I thought it needed to be stopped
before it could steal all the world’s light.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2501_0701_02_10:
All of that’s changed, though, thanks to what I’ve
learned from my children. Now I treat Necrozma
with kindness.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2501_0702_01_10:
That was a different Necrozma back then. Still,
to think that I would ever be partners with a
Pokémon I once tried so hard to defeat...
ch0120_10_lusamine/2501_0702_02_10:
If that’s because the way I express my love has
changed, then I’m happy. But what do you think?
ch0120_10_lusamine/2511_0701_01_10:
Uncovering the mysteries of sync strength is in line
with the goals of the Aether Foundation.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2511_0701_02_10:
I plan on putting a great deal of the foundation’s
resources into the research of sync stones.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2511_0702_01_10:
To be completely honest, though, I’ve felt lately
that I’d rather be battling together with Necrozma
than doing research.
ch0120_10_lusamine/2511_0702_02_10:
I just want to spend more time with Necrozma.
That’s what I feel as a person, not as president of
the foundation.
ch0120_10_lusamine/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning. Did you sleep well? Go ahead and
play outside. The sunlight will feel nice.
ch0120_10_lusamine/3003_0701_01_10:
Good afternoon. The Pokémon on this island look
so relaxed. I’m learning a lot from them.
ch0120_10_lusamine/3005_0701_01_10:
Goodness, look at the time! Off to bed for you!
Morning will be here before you know it!
